Articles.Content:
Some heaving modifications of my DH Vampire, addition of a tailhook and a new nose later... and we finally have a Sea Venom with a working tailhook!

*It is advised you see the Carrier Landing Instructions below images for how to correctly land STOL with the tailhook.* Enjoy!

*Download at bottom of post.*

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/bnksB)

![fMfr0EH.png](http://i.imgur.com/fMfr0EH.png)

![mV1XyaY.png](http://i.imgur.com/mV1XyaY.png)

**Carrier Landing Instructions**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/l0E59)

-----------------------------------------------------

[**-->DOWNLOAD HERE!<--**](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/45202777/DH%20Sea%20Venom/DH%20Sea%20Venom.zip)

Alright! The Sea Venom looks nice! It should find a nice role in my attack on the KSC Island, which has been named Operation Fubar. Rep if you understand the name.

I'm thinking that it could be converted to a photoreconnasaince drone for getting pictures to make maps of the island.
Thank you! The Sea Vixen is next, and it's much bigger and faster than the Venom. It was also the first military fighter not to use guns or cannons.

> 
> Thank you! The Sea Vixen is next, and it's much bigger and faster than the Venom. It was also the first military fighter not to use guns or cannons.

No guns or cannons? So it just had missiles then?

> 
> No guns or cannons? So it just had missiles then?

Missiles, rockets and sometimes bombs.

> 
> Missiles, rockets and sometimes bombs.

I suppose the Vixen was made during that time when people thought that supersonic planes flew too fast for guns to be useful.
Nah actually it was because the recoil of the new 30mm ADEN cannons caused structural issues with the Vixen.

Awesome design; I've long looked for a suitable tailhook system

Looking forward to seeing the Vixen!
Thanks! Sorry I haven't released the Vixen yet... I currently have an addiction to the Witcher 3...
